nodes.text: Join the Imperial Navy was a propaganda poster by the Galactic Empire, encouraging people to join the Imperial Navy. The poster depicts four Imperial-class Star Destroyers viewed from the surface flying overhead with a white-colored planetary body looming overhead, alongside three TIE fighters, and a Gozanti-class cruiser. In addition, two red banners are streaking around the bottom, with the words written, on the top and bottom, respectively, "Explore the Galaxy..." and "Join the Imperial Navy", with the first two words being just outside the bottom red banner. The Imperial Crest is barely visible between the two red streaks.
At the time of the Theft of the TIE Defender Elite, an Aurebesh poster appeared in the streets of the village Jhothal and in Old Jho's Pit Stop.
This poster was first released on StarWars.com as part of an online promotional campaign for the Star Wars Rebels animated series in February 2014.
